title: Fun children's font
content:
Looking for help identifying the following font. Just need the font in the first two lines (Athletic Parties).

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162107im_/https:/d3rjo1mggigg8u.cloudfront.net/images/logo_02.png)

I've tried WhatTheFont, Idenifont, and FontEdge already. The closest I could find were these, but still not perfect matches.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/quaint/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162107/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/quaint/)

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc\_snap\_regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162107/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_snap_regular/)

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/alleycat\_bop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162107/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/alleycat_bop/)

Any help will be greatly appreciated!

Font: 

 Yahoo by Gaut Fonts 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162107/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: rscs

comments.content: Perfect. That's it! Thank you so much! I think the use of lowercase letters was throwing me off. Appreciate the help, DPape!
